sources.title: Cossacks of the Kuban
sources.description:
Representatives of two prosperous Kuban collective farms, Galina Peresvetova and Gordey Voron, meet at the collective farm fair. They love each other, but hide their feelings, because Galina and Gordey are old competitors. They compete in labor exploits, and the main thing for each of them is to bring their collective farm to the forefront. But this is only at first glance, in fact, a vivid love story has been unfolding between them for a long time ...

Year of production: 1949

Director: Pyryev Ivan
Screenwriter: Nikolai Pogodin
Composer: Dunayevsky Isaac
Operator: Pavlov Valentin
Production designers: Turylev Georgy, Chebotarev Boris, Pimenov Yury

Cast: Volodin Vladimir, Andreev Boris, Petrov Andrey, Luchko Klara, Savinova Ekaterina, Ladynina Marina, Davydov Vladlen, Savitskaya Elena, Blinnikov Sergey, Lukyanov Sergey, Khvylya Alexander, Lyubimov Yuri, Telegina Valentina, Dorofeev Vladimir

metadata.Plot: In the steppes of the Kuban love is born on two collective farms while wheat is (enthusiastically) gathered. Galina, the energetic chairwoman of one of the two kolkhozes, vies with her male counterpart for the best harvest. At the same time Gordey, her rival, a former soldier, is (and has been for ages) in love with her. On her part, Dasha a collective farm worker, has heartbeat for a young technician of the competing kolkhoz...
metadata.Actors: Sergei Lukyanov, Marina Ladynina, Aleksandr Khvylya
